author: Ashtan Mistal
title: Anyone struggling with Handin Help
question:
Hi guys! I was struggling with the last part of the setup where you enter your CWL and password.  Here's how I did it and it worked for me. I hope this helps anyone struggling with it.
  Step 1: Make sure you change the yellow highlighted part with your username that has 8 characters
Step 2: Save the file. I saved it as "Save Definition As" 
Step 3: click SPD Handin and enter your CWL and password. You should get an email and it should say "Handin Successful"
Hope this helps :)
